effect.short: Removes the user's fire type after inflicting damage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the user's fire type after damage calculation.  If the user is not fire-type, this move will fail.

flavorTexts.text:
To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out.
After using this move, the user will no longer be
Fire type.

To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out.
After using this move, the user will no longer be
Fire type.
